thread.title: Criminal justice reform bill clears Senate committee
thread.title_full: Criminal justice reform bill clears Senate committee - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Criminal justice reform bill clears Senate committee
text: The Senate Judiciary Committee approved a bill Thursday to grant thousands of federal prisoners a chance at early release, as senators fought to make sure the new bipartisan criminal justice reforms sought by Republicans and Democrats apply retroactively to those already convicted. Non-violent drug offenders would see their mandatory minimum ... ...
